languages.text: {n}Аккуратно вынув останки папиросы изо рта, Инфернус-мастер вкрадчиво интересуется:{/n} "Спятил, святоша?"
{n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"
languages.original_text: {n}Аккуратно вынув останки папиросы изо рта, Инфернус-мастер вкрадчиво интересуется:{/n} "Спятил, святоша?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Infernus Master removes the remains of the cigarette from his mouth and asks carefully:{/n} "Have you gone off your rocker, you damned fanatic?"
{n}The Infernus Master removes the remains of the cigarette from his mouth and asks carefully:{/n} "Have you gone off your rocker, you damned fanatic?"
{n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the cigarette from his mouth and asks with utmost caution,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"
{n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the cigarette from his mouth and asks with utmost caution,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"
{n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"
{n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"

languages.text: {n}El maestro de infernus se quita la colilla de lho de la boca y pregunta en voz baja:{/n} «¿Te has vuelto loco, condenado fanático?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de infernus se quita la colilla de lho de la boca y pregunta en voz baja:{/n} «¿Te has vuelto loco, condenado fanático?».

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターは、最後の1本のルホスティックを口から離すと、低い声でこう尋ねた。{/n}「正気を失ったのか、そこの信者？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターは、最後の1本のアイホスティックを口から離すと、低い声でこう尋ねた。{/n}「正気を失ったのか、そこの信者？」

languages.text: {n}控火大师抽出最后一根麻烟，低声问道。{/n}“你是疯了吗，你这个该死的狂热分子？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}控火大师抽出最后一根麻烟，低声问道。{/n}“你是疯了吗，你这个该死的狂热分子？”

languages.text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister nimmt sich den Rest seines Lho-Stabs aus dem Mund und fragt leise:{/n} "Habt Ihr den Verstand verloren, Ihr verfluchter Fanatiker?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister nimmt sich den Rest seines Lho-Stabs aus dem Mund und fragt leise:{/n} "Habt Ihr den Verstand verloren, Ihr verfluchter Fanatiker?"

languages.text: {n}Le maître-infernus retire le cigalho, ou du moins ce qu'il en reste, de sa bouche et gronde d'une voix sourde :{/n} « Auriez-vous perdu la tête, maudit fanatique ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître-infernus retire le cigalho, ou du moins ce qu'il en reste, de sa bouche et gronde d'une voix sourde :{/n} « Auriez-vous perdu la tête, maudit fanatique ? »

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı, liho dalından kalan parçayı ağzından çıkarıp kısık bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Ulan softa, aklını mı yitirdin sen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master pulls the last of the lho-stick from his mouth and asks in a low voice,{/n} "Have you lost your mind, you damned fanatic?"
